text: gular vertebral endplates - Joint stiffness - Limited hip movement - Mild short stature - Ovoid vertebral bodies - Short femoral neck - Short metacarpal - Short phalanx of finger - Small epiphyses - Waddling gait - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough estimate of the percentage
